data.actual_result: You cannot scroll down to see actions. It will fill your entire screen. http://i.imgur.com/4Igtp2H.png
data.expected_result: Be able to scroll down and see the action buttons.
data.short_description: Too Many Roles break the guild user menu (reported for Omniscient#0002)
data.steps_to_repro: - Tap on profile with many and long role names
